testcase.classname: US_034 As an administrator, I want the Product List page to be able to access the product lists on the site.
testcase.name: TC_3401 Verify that the Product List page is accessible from the Products menu.
testcase.system-out: Given Go to "myUrl" page....................................................passed Then Enter a valid "Email" address and "Password" in the relevant fields on the page that opens, then click the SIGN IN button..passed Then Then a message about successful login should appear in a green box in the upper right corner of the screen..passed Then The Products Title should be clickable under the PRODUCT MANAGE title on the left side of the screen on the Dashboard page..passed Then Click on the link button titled Product Lists from the options listed under the Products Title..passed Then Then, it is checked that the Products page is opened and the Product List window visible on the screen..passed
